<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs=""
>
[Practical Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=3920) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Kingdom" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=438" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 532</row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Magic](/Skills.aspx?ID=27)

</column>

---

Magic has an honored place in your society, and your people incorporate it into their everyday work to make life easier. You gain a +1 status bonus to Magic checks, and you can use Magic checks in place of [Engineering](/Skills.aspx?ID=22) checks. In addition, as magic-wielding NPCs find your nation a comfortable place to live and work, you reduce the cost of using the [Hire Adventurers](/Actions.aspx?ID=1394) activity to 1 RP.
